sentence: Induce the culture with 0.3mM conc. of IPTG for 4 hrs. Harvest the cells by centrifugation at 5500 rpm at 4° C for 15 min

sentence: Wash the cells twice with 1 X PBS. Resuspend the pellet in protein extraction buffer. Add lysozyme to the concentration of 1mg/ml and incubate on ice for 30 min. with occasional mixing in between.

result.sentence: Wash the cells twice with 1 X PBS.
Resuspend the pellet in protein extraction buffer.
Add lysozyme to the concentration of 1mg/ml and incubate on ice for 30 min. with occasional mixing in between.

sentence:
Add Triton X 100 (0. 2%) and DNase (5µg/ml) to the above mix followed by vigorous shaking.
Incubate for 1 hr at 4° C with gentle shaking to solubilize the fusion protein.

result.sentence: Add Triton X 100 (0.2%) and DNase (5µg/ml) to the above mix followed by vigorous shaking.
Incubate for 1 hr at 4° C with gentle shaking to solubilize the fusion protein.

sentence:
Spin at 10,000 rpm for 10 minutes. Clarify the above supernatant by filtration through 0.4µ filters.
Note: Cell lysate from BL21 expressing GST (Empty pGEX4T-2) is used as control to compare with the cell lysate expressing GST fusion protein. Both samples are processed simultaneously
